name: First Game Alpha
description:
It is just a trial ;This is not the Full game ..... actually i have not decided to make a game  // Follow me - https://itch.io/profile/pizuu

I am not sure if it will work for Linux or mac

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Some obstacles in game - 

- There is a jump pad that boost you and throw in sky little bit

-There is Teleportation system when you reach the place located  in between of two big rectangles then you will teleport to another place

- There is a platform that disappear after 1-2 sec when you stand on it ... That is similar to the obstacle that is in the fall guys

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The achievement - there is a crown in the map near the jump pad  Try to catch it .......... Lets see XD

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tips - You can double jump in the mid air  (only once);

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow me on itch or Join my discord sever - https://discord.gg/3RUAG6U54q

Don't Forgot to comment
